title: Hikikomori: alienation through technology
creator_contributor_role: Bachelor of Arts (Animation & Interactive Media), RMIT University, production facilities
abstract: Hikikomori = those who isolate themselves from society
description: "In the year 2004, it was expected that 1 million young adults will withdraw from the Japanese society." This interpretative performance piece explores Hikikomori through representational images - a sculpture of animation and art. Performers:  Yee Wei, Lester King. No dialogue, music soundtrack only.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000720; RMIT BA(AIM) Graduate Screening 2005; Active; 2005
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
